document.title: Billions and Billions
document.abstract: The Reuters brand is associated with its international multimedia news services, but a larger part of its business is in financial services, including online trading and financial information. Dunn is a familiar face in the information industry, as former president of the Information Industry Association and CEO of Thomson Learning's Academic and International group. Products like ISI Web of Knowledge, Dialog, DataStar, and Westlaw, all major offerings in academic, law, and other corporate libraries, will become part of Thomson-Reuters Professional.
document.publication-title: School of Information Sciences -- Faculty Publications and Other Works

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Tenopir, Carol. “Billions and Billions,” Library Journal 132 (July 2007).
